content.rendered: Jamie xx rarely disappoints, whether it's his solo work or as part of The xx. His amazing Gil Scott-Heron remix album, "We're New Here" was a highlight of 2011. If this summer's "All Under One Roof Raving" is anything to go by, his solo album should be well worth the wait.
